Title: Cool Change
Plot: A man is killed after winning a fortune and then dumping his girlfriend, so Grissom, Nick and newcomer to the CSI team, Sara Sidel, investigate the case. Warrick is up for suspension for leaving Holly at the crime scene by herself.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Harrison Young, Tim deZarn, Ellen Crawford, Timilee Romolini, Zach Johnson, Garland Witt, M. Darnell Suttles, Rocky McMurray, Eric Szmanda, Johnny Messner, Chandra West, Jeff Snyder
